description:
Now that "True Blood" is over, Kristin Bauer van Straten has a little more free time -- free time that she'll fill when she returns to "Once Upon a Time" as the villainous Maleficent in the second half of Season 4. 《真爱如血》已经结局，Kristin Bauer van Straten的自由时间更多了一些——这些时间让她可以回归《童话镇》第四季后半季扮演反派Maleficent。

According to Entertainment Weekly, the actress will recur throughout the second half of Season 4 as Maleficent, who hasn't been seen since she showed up in scary zombie form at the end of Season 2. 据《娱乐周刊》报道，这位女演员将会在第四季后半段中出现多次，她扮演的Maleficent从第二季出现一次之后就再也没有出现过了。

"Once Upon a Time" Season 4 premieres Sunday, Sept. 28 at 8 p.m. ET/PT on ABC. 《童话镇》第四季将会在北京时间9月29日在ABC电视台回归。

title: Maleficent回归《童话镇》第四季
